gobblin.compliance

Class HivePartitionDatasetPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.compliance.HivePartitionDatasetPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Policy<HivePartitionDataset>

    public class HivePartitionDatasetPolicy
extends Object
implements Policy<HivePartitionDataset>
    This policy checks if a Hive Partition is a valid dataset. Hive table to which Hive partition belongs must be an external table. Hive table name must not contain "_trash_", "_staging_" and "_backup_" in it's name since they will considered as HivePartitionVersion rather than HivePartitionDataset
